meanings.definition: Of or relating to the back or upper surface of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The notal stripes on the tiger's back were distinct and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The notal feathers of the bird were a vibrant shade of blue.
meanings.sent3: The notal markings on the turtle's shell looked like a map of the stars.
meanings.sent4: The notal patterns on the snake's skin resembled a winding river.
meanings.sent5: The notal ridge on the mountain stood tall against the sky.

meanings.definition: Situated on or near the back.
meanings.sent1: The notal position of the backpack made it comfortable to carry.
meanings.sent2: The notal pocket on the jacket was perfect for storing small items.
meanings.sent3: The notal location of the treehouse provided a great view of the garden.
meanings.sent4: The notal placement of the painting added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The notal spot for the picnic was under the shady tree.

meanings.sent1: The notal protected the knight from incoming arrows.
meanings.sent2: The shiny notal gleamed under the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The notal shield was decorated with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent4: The notal of the beetle was hard and resistant to damage.
meanings.sent5: The notal of the armor was engraved with the family crest.
